content.en: Arterial Elasticity Assessment: Scientists have been exploring various algorithms to assess the elasticity and strain of arteries in order to study conditions like atherosclerosis. These algorithms include cross-correlation tracking, Lagrangian speckle model estimation, non-rigid image registration, and ultrasound speckle tracking. By using these algorithms, researchers aim to develop non-invasive methods to accurately measure and characterize arterial elasticity, which could potentially help in diagnosing and treating cardiovascular diseases.
content.da: Vurdering af Arteriel Elastik: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer til at vurdere elasticiteten og belastningen af arterier for at studere tilstande som åreforkalkning. Disse algoritmer inkluderer krydskorrelationssporing, Lagrangiansk speckle-modelestimering, ikke-rigid billedregistrering og ultralydsspecklesporing. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at udvikle ikke-invasive metoder til nøjagtigt at måle og karakterisere arteriel elasticitet, hvilket potentielt kunne hjælpe med at diagnosticere og behandle hjerte-kar-sygdomme.
